title: WTB:  N173 & Goodwin Album Redemption Coupons
author: Joe_G.

posts.post_title: WTB:  N173 & Goodwin Album Redemption Coupons
posts.post_content:
Looking for redemption coupons issued by Goodwin & Co. for cabinet cards (N173) and albums, especially those not pictured below.  These little inserts go by many names including coupons, slips, certificates, and tickets.

Also interested in the five panel 1888 cabinet checklist.

Thank You!,
Joe G.
[url]detroitwolverines@gmail.com[/url]
Friendly Bump, I guess I need to combine this with my card related thread.
